body.name: TOPSKY Computer Desk with Bookshelf/Metal Hole Cable Cover 1.18" Thick Desk (55", Rustic Brown)

features: CT-8025: 1 year warranty and suitable for office use. ※All of Synthetic wood furniture in TOPSKY were using CARB P2 Class board.

Super Sturdy: Desktop made of 1.18" thick board, waterproof and ant scratch, easy to clean, 1.57"X1.57" (40mm*40mm)metal legs are strong enough to support heavy duty parcels（Up to nearly 500lb）. Rest assured that your expensive equipment will be safe and secure on this wobble-free desk.
Big Space: 55" x 23.6" (140 X60cm) desktop provides plenty of room for a variety of monitor and laptop setups along with important work projects and office supplies.
Multi-function Shelf：Accommodate items up to 11.4" (29cm) in Height. With 8.46" (21.5cm) depth, can be easily stored headphones, headphone stand, routers, power strip, etc.
Metal Grommet Hole Cable Cover: Easy to install and also easy to remove, convenient to use. With a flip open cover, allows wire and cable to pass through safely and neatly.

What is California’s Proposition 65 ? It requires businesses to provide warnings to Californians about significant exposures to chemicals that cause cancer, birth defects etc, requiring websites that sell products that qualify for the warning to include these labels(As desk,chair etc). How far does the shelf on the bottom jut out ? Shelf on the bottom jut out 8.5inch. Is the product made by real wood ? No, it made by Particleboard and MDF. Can this desk support an external keyboard and mouse tray ? No. How to contact with TOPSKY service team if item defective or missing part ? You can contact through Amazon message box, or check our Email box and Phone Number from our Amazon HP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great desk, excellent value, awesome quality! I got the 55 in version. It arrived with no damages and was packed with care. Holds two monitors and two laptops with room to spare. Lights not included but because the legs are metal, it's easy to attach some, without damaging the "wood". It's very sturdy and doesn't shake one bit. Love this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VALUE, VALUE, VALUE!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: IN LOVE with this desk! I put it together alone (I'm a 5'3" 160 lb female) in roughly 30 minutes with a little help from other furniture in the room to prop up the legs while I added the crossbeam and a box to support the shelf while I screwed it to the frame. I haven't USED it yet, as I need help putting it in place, and since I work from home (starting in about an hour) I need to take my time when relocating my computers, modem, etc, but I'll update again tomorrow if I'm allowed to do that!The design is perfect - the legs require no assembly, and with the 3 crossbeams in each leg, I don't think it's going to allow for much wiggle! The desktop is GORGEOUS - and almost weighed too much for me to move by myself - yes, it's THAT HEAVY!! If you can, definitely have another person to help you put it together, WHICH is recommended on the instruction sheet. If not, it's doable by one person, as long as you have a bit of strength. Speaking of the instruction sheet - talk about SIMPLE to assemble! You don't need any tools from your toolbox - They included a screwdriver that tightened all 4 types of screws/bolts. Every type of screw and bolt came with 1 extra piece - and they're not cheap aluminum pieces... they are STRONG! I am soooo thrilled with this desk!For the $109+ price tag that I paid for this desk, I have a desk of a quality worth twice that amount! Even if the price goes up, it is worth it! I'm going to look for more to buy from this company because the quality is much higher than you'd expect at this price point, and no, I'm not a paid spokesperson, LOL!!!***24-HOUR UPDATE***I used this desk all day yesterday in my work-from-home job as a medical transcriptionist. The last table I'd used for a desk had my monitor wobbling with just about every keystroke (I guess I hit the keys with some force). This desk stopped that. My screen never moved, unless I bumped the desk HARD. The shelf underneath doesn't interfere with my use of a foot pedal for work, and I stretch my legs out for this, rather than sitting the way one is supposed to for proper ergonomics (knees at 90-degree angles for 8+ hours a day = blood clots!). I'm not sure how it would be for a taller person, but my shins weren't hit by the shelf at all. Still head over heels over this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Afordable Desk
reviews.reviewText: I've used this desk and the matching file cabinet for over a year. They still look brand new. There's still a gloss on the finish, and no scratches. I'm surprised there's no scratching on either the file cabinet or desk. My desk is near a bright sunny window, and my two cat's take turns sitting on both. After two cats jumping on and off to look outside the window, both items are in brand new condition. There's no fading in color, since it's near a bright window and sun hits it sometimes. The file cabinet is used daily and glides open without any problems. Also, there's no sagging with the desk. I like the basic design, however, I would have preferred no shelf underneath the desk. It sometimes gets in the way of arranging the many cables. It also makes it impossible to put the file cabinet under the desk, to save room. The shelf adds extra stability, so I think it's needed. I originally ordered the smaller desk, (47"). It didn't exactly match the file cabinet, and was too small for me. I ended up purchasing the 55" desk. It was a perfect match with the file cabinet. I was a little concerned since the larger desk was purchase separate at a different time from the file. I highly recommend for the price and color (oak), and design. It arrived packaged without any bad materials, (as someone mentioned) and in excellent condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a true big and tall man. This desk was one of the better pieces of furniture I found.
reviews.reviewText: To begin with, I am 6'5", and just under 300lbs. My search for a desk that would not only support my computers and work environment, but also to provide an aesthetically pleasing addition to my office. I'll get back to that shortly.Easy assembly. The addition of the shelf was a nice touch. It provides added overflow space. I was running dual 32" monitors, and had room for my primary notebook on the desk. Keyboard, mouse, phone charger. And I still have room to work. With my configuration, there is enough room to me to review contracts and other docs, and stay organized. And with all this equipment, the desk is quite sturdy. The width of the wood is great, and provides a feeling of confidence in the weight that I am placing on this desk. It does not rock back and forth, nor feel "loose" in any form or fashion. It is high enough for me to use comfortably as a big and tall person, and has no issues when I'm leaning on the desktop. There is not a category for big and tall desks, but this works not only for me, but my under 6' wife as well.The color of the reclaimed wood is on the darker scale, but not as dark as walnut. It's soothing to see from a day to day perspective. I went with this wood and black to help with a minimalist approach to this workspace. This is where this desk exceeds expectations.Work can be chaotic at times. I have learned and have started to share the concepts of a minimalist approach to the work environment, keeping those things that are needed available, not not strown across the surface. Herein is the beauty of the added shelf. A drawer becomes a place of clutter, whereas the box on the shelf holds only those things that are used on a regular basis. (When was the last time you needed a staple remover?). It's clean and streamlined. The result is a peaceful environment in which to function.I have had 4 other desks - a gaming computer desk, managerial style with filing cabinets as drawers on each side, and a simple glass top. This is my fourth and final one.I will ask the manufacturer or seller a question or two about an item sometimes to insure that if something happens, they would respond. I did just that prior to the order, and the seller responded quickly and professionally.Thank you for taking your time to read this review. Have a great day and be safe.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy and attractive desk sized just right for small office
reviews.reviewText: Photos show pieces & hardware unboxed. Everything was provided including a small screwdriver. The desk was securely packaged with styrofoam, protective squishy film layer on the wood desktop (not the correct name I'm sure), and cardboard. Very clear assembly instructions and each labelled package of screws included a spare piece. I appreciate that because sometimes knock-down furniture makers use inferior hardware that can break but these were good quality pieces. The finished wood and matte metal legs are in perfect condition. Holes were predrilled and lined up, and I easily assembled this by myself. FYI the desk delivered in the box is heavy (60 lbs => 27kg). Very good value, perfect size, handy shelf, and no regrets about buying.

reviews.reviewTitle: A reasonably priced, solid and attractive computer desk
reviews.reviewText: This computer desk is just what I was looking for and is as advertised! It arrived on time and was very well-packed for the shipping journey (thankfully). Assembly was an easy, 1-person job and all the holes for the connecting parts lined up perfectly - they even provided an extra screw in each bag of the different screws needed, along with clear instructions and a little screwdriver.I love the little shelf under the desk as I finally have an out-of-the-way place for my external hard drives etc. (just need to be mindful when crossing/uncrossing one's legs to not hit it with one's foot).Frankly, I don't see how this item could be improved upon and I definitely would order another if I had the extra space. I can't recommend it enough!

Although the delivery was longer than stated (due to pandemic) it still only took 7 days to arrive. As for the desk, it was packed really well, and the packaging was easy to clean up with the type of products used. When putting this desk together it suggests 2 people which although I did it myself with no issues because I had tools that I used as a second person to hold items level. Took about 30 minutes to assemble Lots of space for the computer tower on top of the desk along with 2 24" monitors and keyboard and mouse. Also, this desk is very sturdy and has a nice finish and a large enough hole for lots of cords to pass through to the power bar. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS DESK TO FRIENDS AND FAMILY.

Great desk, even better in person. The finish is great quality and love the modern sleek look. Easy to assemble. The only complaint while assembly is to keep a vacuum and a good dust cloth close by. The material it was wrapped in left tiny looking filaments that almost looked like tiny Fibre glass filaments all over the parts and floors. That is why I took away a star.

Great sturdiness , easy to assemble . I have some issue with movement , but I was able to assemble it by myself .I'm very satisfied with TOPSKY Computer Desk If one day I see 60"-63 " option I buy another one for my second room . For unknown reason the color of the table is darker then in the picture on Amazon but for me it is even better The box had many damages .Three of them was "see through" the carton (forklift ) but because of excellent inside protection packaging no any scratches or damaged for parts .I would rate this computer table it 6 from 5 star ) .
